articles.title: Lina Khan points to Figma IPO as vindication of M&A scrutiny - TechCrunch
articles.description: A surprising figure is celebrating Figma’s successful IPO: Lina Khan, former chair of the Federal Trade Commission, who said the offering demonstrates the value of "letting startups grow into independently successful businesses."
articles.content:

articles.title: Under RFK Jr, CDC skips study on vaccination rates, quietly posts data on drop - Ars Technica
articles.description: Vaccination rates fell once again as nonmedical exemptions hit a new high.
